Text of the status of download on download queue or status bar: canceled
Text of the status of download on download queue or status bar: completed
Text of the status of download on download queue: or status bar Downloading
{0} - Percent of download {1} - Download speed per sec {2} - Episode title
Text of the status of download on download queue or status bar: error
Text of the status of download on download queue or status bar: starting
Text of the status of download on download queue or status bar: unknown

The duration of something. {0} is the time in minutes (abbreviation)

Open command
It means something happened 1 minute ago.
It means something happened 1 month ago.
It means something happened 1 hour ago.
It means something happened 1 year ago.
It means something happened N days ago. {0} is the number of days (e.g.: 5 days ago)
It means something happened N hours ago. {0} is the number of hours (e.g.: 3 hours ago)
It means something happened seconds ago. For example, an item was added to history seconds ago.
It means something happened N minute ago. {0} is the number of minutes (e.g.: 15 minutes ago)
It means something happened N months ago. {0} is the number of months (e.g.: 10 months ago)
It means the relative time is not available. For example, how long ago an episode was released.
It means something happened N years ago. {0} is the number of years (e.g.: 3 years ago)
It means something happened Yesterday

trans-unit.source: Removes unnecessary entries in the database and temporary files to free up disk space and optimize app performance. The database cleanup runs automatically once a week
trans-unit.target: Rimuove le voci non necessarie nel database e i file temporanei per liberare spazio su disco e ottimizzare le prestazioni dell'app. La pulizia del database viene eseguita automaticamente una volta a settimana
